pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulates Dice Rolls and Coin Flips // Utils for basic statistical experiments, that can be used for teaching introductory statistics. Each experiment generates a tibble. Dice rolls and coin flips are simulated using sample(). The properties of the dice can be changed, like the number of sides. A coin flip is simulated using a two sided dice. Experiments can be combined with the pipe-operator.
